original_title: Die Feuer- und die Wasserprobe. Gespräche mit Thomas Bernhard
overview: In this film, Austrian author Thomas Bernhard (1931–1989) talks about his childhood, his youth, his life in Austria, and his coming to terms, as a writer, with all the experiences of dying – his own and those of the culture of his time.
title: Die Feuer- und die Wasserprobe. Gespräche mit Thomas Bernhard
